examples: I was quite shocked when I found out what he'd done.
Me quedé bastante sorprendido cuando descubrí lo que había hecho.
We were all shocked at the news of his death.
A todos nos sorprendió la noticia de su muerte.
He was visibly shocked by the incident.
Estaba visiblemente conmocionado por el incidente.
We are all very shocked and saddened by the news of John's death.
Todos estamos muy conmocionados y entristecidos por la noticia de la muerte de John.
